bcbioSingleCell 0.1.2
  • Reference

Sample Data

Source: R/methods-sampleData.R
sampleData.Rd

Metadata in columns describing the samples, which are defined in the rownames. Similar to colData(), which for bcbioSingleCell and SingleCellExperiment objects describes cells in the columns, rather than the samples.

# S4 method for SingleCellExperiment
sampleData(object, interestingGroups,
  return = c("DataFrame", "data.frame", "kable"))

# S4 method for seurat
sampleData(object, interestingGroups,
  return = c("DataFrame", "data.frame"))

# S4 method for SingleCellExperiment,DataFrame
sampleData(object) <- value

# S4 method for seurat,DataFrame
sampleData(object) <- value

Arguments

object

Object.
interestingGroups

Character vector of interesting groups. Must be formatted in camel case and intersect with sampleData() colnames.
return

Return type. Uses base::match.arg() internally and defaults to the first argument in the vector.
value

Object to assign.

Value

data.frame.

Examples

# bcbioSingleCell ====
x <- bcb_small
sampleData(x) %>% glimpse()
#> Formal class 'DataFrame' [package "S4Vectors"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ rownames       : chr "multiplexed_AAAAAAAA"
#>   ..@ nrows          : int 1
#>   ..@ listData       :List of 8
#>   .. ..$ sampleName       : Factor w/ 1 level "rep_1": 1
#>   .. ..$ description      : Factor w/ 1 level "multiplexed": 1
#>   .. ..$ fileName         : Factor w/ 1 level "multiplexed.fastq.gz": 1
#>   .. ..$ index            : Factor w/ 1 level "1": 1
#>   .. ..$ sequence         : Factor w/ 1 level "TTTTTTTT": 1
#>   .. ..$ aggregate        : Factor w/ 1 level "sample": 1
#>   .. ..$ revcomp          : Factor w/ 1 level "AAAAAAAA": 1
#>   .. ..$ interestingGroups: Factor w/ 1 level "rep_1": 1
#>   ..@ elementType    : chr "ANY"
#>   ..@ elementMetadata: NULL
#>   ..@ metadata       : list()
sampleData(x)[["batch"]] <- 1L
sampleData(x) %>% glimpse()
#> Formal class 'DataFrame' [package "S4Vectors"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ rownames       : chr "multiplexed_AAAAAAAA"
#>   ..@ nrows          : int 1
#>   ..@ listData       :List of 9
#>   .. ..$ sampleName       : Factor w/ 1 level "rep_1": 1
#>   .. ..$ description      : Factor w/ 1 level "multiplexed": 1
#>   .. ..$ fileName         : Factor w/ 1 level "multiplexed.fastq.gz": 1
#>   .. ..$ index            : Factor w/ 1 level "1": 1
#>   .. ..$ sequence         : Factor w/ 1 level "TTTTTTTT": 1
#>   .. ..$ aggregate        : Factor w/ 1 level "sample": 1
#>   .. ..$ revcomp          : Factor w/ 1 level "AAAAAAAA": 1
#>   .. ..$ interestingGroups: Factor w/ 1 level "rep_1": 1
#>   .. ..$ batch            : Factor w/ 1 level "1": 1
#>   ..@ elementType    : chr "ANY"
#>   ..@ elementMetadata: NULL
#>   ..@ metadata       : list()
